The music on the "Thief" album is actually reworkings of the themes used in the film. There were other tracks used, from other TD albums of the period, but not included on the album, with the exception of "Igneous", which is a reworking of the second part of "Thru Metamorphic Rocks", from the "Force Majeure" album.

The US issue of the album features a track "Confrontation" by Craig Safan, which was not released in any other markets. It was intended, by Director Michael Mann, to have a TD sound & feel, but doesn't, IMO, sit well with the TD music.

The 2004 re-issue on Wounded Bird records features "Confrontation", but omits "Igneous".

This issue is, again, IMO, only worth picking up as a download, or buying for the curiosity value.
